text:
(1)

3532 Richmond Terrace, south side, east of Linfield Avenue, showing the rear of an old house located on the property of the Downey Shipbuilding Corp. In 1874 (Beers's map) it was the G. Bowman estate.

P. L. Sperr

(2)

The same, a more distant view.

P. L. Sperr

September 25, 1931
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Linfield Avenue
